name: Add_a_checklist
steps: Open the document in the word processing application.
Navigate to the location where you want to add the checklist.
Click on the 'Insert' tab in the application's toolbar.
Select the 'Checklist' option from the 'Text' group.
A checklist will be inserted at the cursor position.
Enter the checklist items one by one.
Press Enter after each item to create a new checklist item.
Continue adding items until the checklist is complete.
Save the document to apply the changes.
